fees.note: Indexers require an on-chain output >= 1% of tx value to fee_address in the same tx. fee_scope='per_tx' means fees are collected once per transfer inscription transaction. Additional checks: sufficient balance in 'from' (post any locks/vesting), no exceeds on recipient caps if applicable.

meta.reason: Transfer UNQ units (public/non-locked tokens only; indexer validates balance and conditions)
